document_data.name: ''Cape of the Mountebank''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cape of the mountebank''''' granted its wearer the use of ''[[dimension door]]'' once per day.
document_data.Description: It smelled of brimstone, and created a cloud of smoke when used to teleport, both at the point of departure and arrival.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Jarlaxle]], founder and leader of [[Bregan D'aerthe]]
* [[Laskilar]], a pirate captain of [[Jahaka Anchorage]]
